raw_text: The balcony is located in the southwest corner side, It is next to living   , The size of the room is  2 feet width  and 10   feet length The bathroom is located in the west side, It is between master and common, The size of the room is 5 feet width  and 5  feet length The common room is located in the  northwest corner side, It is next to living room ,The size of the room is 10  feet width  and  12   feet length The kitchen is located in the northeast corner side, It is next to living room , The size of the room is 4  feet width  and  6  feet length The living room is located in the east side, It is in front of all other rooms, The size of the room is 10 feet  width  and 16  feet length The master room is located in the southwest corner, It is next to living room , The size of the room is 10 feet width  and 11  feet length
